h1_title: How to Open the Purple Seal Prison Doors in the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: How to Remove the Purple Magic Seals on the Prison Cells in Chapter 3
content: With nothing else to do here for now, you’ll want to continue along the ledge (past the Lantern Wardens if the room is in its greyish haze) toward the first Keeper’s Shrine of the realm. Just before the shrine, you’ll see another one of the locked purple doors.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Open_the_Purple_Seal_Prison_Doors_in_the_Pagoda_Realm.md', within the main section titled 'How to Open the Purple Seal Prison Doors in the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'How to Remove the Purple Magic Seals on the Prison Cells in Chapter 3'.
The content is as follows:
With nothing else to do here for now, you’ll want to continue along the ledge (past the Lantern Wardens if the room is in its greyish haze) toward the first Keeper’s Shrine of the realm. Just before the shrine, you’ll see another one of the locked purple doors.
